Esbjerg Visitor Information Centre A modern self service visitors centre has replaced the traditional tourist bureau. Here you yourself can search for information about Esbjerg, Ribe and Southwest Jutland, including the Wadden Sea National Park.
The centre features state-of-the-art information technology, brochures and maps of the area. There is an invalid access ramp and a guest toilet.
The visitor information centre is open:
Sunday - Wednesday 10.00 - 20.00
Thursday - Saturday 10.00 - 18.00
The centre is closed on the 24, 25 and 31 December and on the 1 January.
Info phone: +45 75 12 55 99 Monday - Friday 10.00 - 16.00
Info mail: visitesbjer...
Address: VisitEsbjerg | Skolegade 33 | DK-6700 Esbjerg
